text:
-gniScaq vA Eqtau sOma#Sca kaqthA sOmA#yA&&*tiqthyaM kriqyatEq nAgnayaq itiq yadaqgnAvaqgniM ma#thiqtvA praqhara#tiq tEnaiqvAgnaya# AtiqthyaM kri#yaqtE &thOq KalvA#huraqgniH sarvA# dEqvatAq itiq yaddhaqvirAqsAdyAqgniM mantha#ti 
haqvyAyaiqvA&&*sa#nnAyaq sarvA# dEqvatA# janayati || 7 
(patni#yA Eqva - jaga#tyAq - A - triqvRudvai - pa#riqdhIn - va#daqntyE - ka#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A1)
